item.name: Frogger Mini Game
item.desc: The classic Frogger arcade game, shrunk into a portable, vintage case—you're sure to have fun for hours! The game has a cover which flips up, and on the other side is the screen which is reflected in a mirror.

item.name: Lego Duplo Set
item.desc: This massive Lego Duplo Set contains over 724 pieces, consisting of various sets including: Duplo Farm, Duplo Airport, Duplo Train set, Duplo tank engine and heaps of other building blocks.

item.name: Marvel Comic
item.desc: Two great vintage 70s classic Marvel comics, featuring the spectacular mighty Thor, Captain America and Iron Man adventures. Fifty off-white pages, from the Fawcett 1945 reserve.

item.name: Crocheted Giraffe
item.desc: This cuddly handmade Giraffe is good quality to last a lifetime. It is a great gift for children. Comes in red, blue and green.

item.name: Nikon DLSR
item.desc: The Nikon D40X is a lightweight and portable camera that proves that it can be both incredibly simple. Just turn on the camera's auto mode, look through the clear, bright viewfinder and shoot.

item.name: Model Train
item.desc: Excellent cosmetic condition of a Hornby Class 29 in British Rail Blue Livery. Locomotive runs excellent in both direction, all buffers and coupling hooks are present.

item.name: Whoopee Cushion
item.desc: It's the classic—the one and only whoopee cushion! Blow it up, put it under someone's cushion and wait for the fun!
